statusLine.command: input=$(cat); branch=$(git -C "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')" --no-optional-locks branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'no-git'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); used=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // "0"'); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); echo "$branch | $model | Context: ${used}% used | $dir"
